channel.title: Weird Error =\
channel.description:
[code]Starting Static-Pkz on 0.0.0.0:43594 st r ma g e has joined the game (localhost) swordskid619 has joined the game (NICK-PC) Exception in thread "main" java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException: Dangling meta character '*' near index 0 ***** ^ at java.util.regex.Pattern.error(Unknown Source) at java.util.regex.Pattern.sequence(Unknown Source) at java.util.regex.Pattern.expr(Unknown Source) at java.util.regex.Pattern.compile(Unknown Source) at java.util.regex.Pattern.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.util.regex.Pattern.compile(Unknown Source) at java.lang.String.replaceAll(Unknown Source) at Player.censorStr(Player.java:217) at Player.appendPlayerChatText(Player.java:900) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:939) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:301) at client.update(client.java:9509) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:200) at server.main(server.java:50)[/code]
This is so weird, anytime i chat to some1, i get that error.

You have a syntax error in the regex pattern, har har.

item.title: Weird Error =\
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

[code]Starting Static-Pkz on 0.0.0.0:43594
st r ma g e has joined the game (localhost)
swordskid619 has joined the game (NICK-PC)
Exception in thread “main” java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException: Dangling meta
character ‘*’ near index 0

^
at java.util.regex.Pattern.error(Unknown Source)
at java.util.regex.Pattern.sequence(Unknown Source)
at java.util.regex.Pattern.expr(Unknown Source)
at java.util.regex.Pattern.compile(Unknown Source)
at java.util.regex.Pattern.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.regex.Pattern.compile(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.String.replaceAll(Unknown Source)

This is so weird, anytime i chat to some1, i get that error.
